languages.text: "Ты уверен{mf||а}?" {n}Угол рта Маражая на секунду задирается в ехидной усмешке.{/n}
"Are you sure?" {n}For a second, the corner of Marazhai's mouth quirks upward in a sneer.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ты уверен{mf||а}?" {n}Угол рта Маражая на секунду задирается в ехидной усмешке.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Are you sure?" {n}For a second, the corner of Marazhai's mouth quirks upward in a sneer.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Are you sure?" {n}For a second, the corner of Marazhai's mouth quirks upward in a sneer.{/n}

languages.text: «¿Estás segur{mf|o|a}?». {n}Por un momento, la boca de Marazhai forma una mueca burlona.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Are you sure?" {n}For a second, the corner of Marazhai's mouth quirks upward in a sneer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Estás segur{mf|o|a}?». {n}Por un momento, la boca de Marazhai forma una mueca burlona.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “你确定吗？”{n}有那么一瞬间，玛拉斋嘴角向上翘起，露出一丝嗤笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Are you sure?" {n}For a second, the corner of Marazhai's mouth quirks upward in a sneer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你确吗定？”{n}有那么一瞬间，玛拉斋嘴角向上翘起，露出一丝嗤笑。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「本気か？」{n}一瞬、マラズハイの口元があざ笑うかのように歪んだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Are you sure?" {n}For a second, the corner of Marazhai's mouth quirks upward in a sneer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「本気か？」{n}一瞬、マラズハイの口元があざ笑うかのように歪んだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « En êtes-vous bien {mf|sûr|sûre} ? » {n}L'espace d'un instant, les commissures de ses lèvres se retroussent en un rictus dubitatif.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Are you sure?" {n}For a second, the corner of Marazhai's mouth quirks upward in a sneer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « En êtes-vous bien {mf|sûr|sûre} ? » {n}L'espace d'un instant, les commissures de ses lèvres se retroussent en un rictus dubitatif.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Seid Ihr sicher?" {n}Eine Sekunde lang zieht Marazhai verächtlich die Mundwinkel hoch.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Are you sure?" {n}For a second, the corner of Marazhai's mouth quirks upward in a sneer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Seid Ihr sicher?" {n}Eine Sekunde lang zieht Marazhai verächtlich die Mundwinkel hoch.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Are you sure?" {n}For a second, the corner of Marazhai's mouth quirks upward in a sneer.{/n}

languages.text: "Anlıyor musun?" {n}Marazhai'ın ağzının kenarı, bir anlığına sırıtırmışçasına yukarı kalkıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Are you sure?" {n}For a second, the corner of Marazhai's mouth quirks upward in a sneer.{/n}
